casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
RICHARDSON SPORTS, et al. No. 566P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Shannon P. Metcalf, Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Richardson Sports, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff to Remand: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
